title: About Kasmo
text:
Kasmo waa barnaamij turjumaad oo af Soomaali ku soo bandhigaya ereyada la xiriira garaad gacmeedka (GG).
Barnaamijkan wuxuu ka dhashay iskaashi cilmibaaris oo lagu eegayay sida turjumaaddu uga caawin karto bulshooyinka Bariga Afrika inay fahmaan, su‚Äôaalo iska weyddiiyaan, ayna qaabeeyaan tignoolijyadan saamaynta ku leh nooloshooda. Ujeeddada Kasmo waa in fikradaha salka u ah garaad gacmeedka si fudud loo fahmo, laga doodo, laguna saleeyo hiddaha iyo dhaqan luuqadeedka Soomaaliyeed.
Barnaamijka Kasmo wuxuu daba socdaa ‚ÄúBuugyaraha Ereybixinta Xuquuqda Dhijitaalka ee Af Soomaaliga (2021)‚Äù oo ay si wadajir ah u diyaariyeen koox afyaqaanno, cilmibaaraayaal iyo suxufiyiin Soomaaliyeed, si ay u hal-abuuran ereryo muhiim ah oo la xiriira xuquuqda dhijitaalka. Isbeddelka ballaaran ee uu garaad gacmeedka ku soo kordhiyay curinta iyo faafinta aqoonta ayaa sababay in dadaalkani u gudbo wejigii labaad - soosaarista qaamuusyare af Soomaali iyo Ingiriis ah oo soo koobaya ereyada iyo fikradaha GG.
Ereybixinta aad ka arki kartid boggan wuxuu ka kooban yahay qeexitaanno laba-luuqadle/laba-afle ah oo ku saabsan in ka badan 70 erey oo la xiriira GG. Ereyada waxaa ka mid ah kuwo farsamo iyo kuwo ku saabsan saameynta bulsho ee tignoolajiyadan cusub. Ereybixinta waxaa loo soo bandhigay qaab shabakad ahaan oo si sahlan loo daalacan karo xiriirka ka dhexeeya ereyada. Fadlan guji oo la falgal.
Hoos waxaad ka heli kartaa buugyaraha oo PDF ah. Fadlan dejiso oo la wadaag asxaabtaada üëâüèø PDF.
Buugyaraha ereybixinta GG waxaa lagu diyaariyay kulan-aqooneed laba maalmood socday oo ay hormuud ka ahayd Akadeemiya Goboleedka Af Soomaaliga (AGA), laguna qabtay Muqdisho. Shirkan, oo ay ka qaybgaleen afyaqaanno iyo cilmibaareyaal ayaa lagu hal-bixiyay ereyo la xiriira GG, waxaana ka mid ahaa: (Abwaan Saciid Saalax Axmed, Prof.¬†Cabdalla Cumar Mansuur, Cabdulqaadir Cabdulle Diini, Cabdiweli Maxamed Sh. Cumar, Cabdinaasir Cabdi Daa‚Äôuud, Cabdulqaadir Cabdi Axmed Jubba, Seynab Ugbaad). Hawshan, waxaa isku dubbariday Mohamed Abdimalik iyo Dr.¬†Peter Chonka waxaana taageeray barnaamijka AHRC ee Jaamacadda King‚Äôs College London. Waxaan si gaar ugu mahadcelinaynaa hey‚Äôadaha kala ah: Somali Public Agenda iyo Digital Shelter oo dib‚Äìu-eegis ku sameeyay qamuusyaraha.
Ereybixinta Kasmo weli kow ma joogto. Waa bar-billow waxaana si wadi doonnaa wadatashiyada aan la yeelanayno barayaasha, suxufiyiinta iyo bulshada rayidka, si loo sii kobciyo qaamusyaraha. Munaasabad isugu jirto ansixin iyo daahfur ayaan qorshaynaynaa in lagu qabto Muqdisho bisha Nofembar 2025.

title: About Kasmo
text:
Ka Qayb Qaado

Barayaasha, saxafiyiinta, iyo bulshada rayidka ah ee danaynaysa adeegsiga ama wax ku biirinta qaamuuska waanu soo dhawaynaynaa.
Falcelinta tarjumaadda, ereyada ama qaabdhismeedka bogga ciddi wax inagu biirinayso waanu ka mahad celinaynaa.

title: About Kasmo
text:
Kasmo bridges Somali and English to make AI concepts understandable and open to conversation.
Kasmo is a translation initiative that brings the language of artificial intelligence into Somali. It grew from collaborative research exploring how translation can help East African societies understand, question, and shape the technologies transforming their digital lives. Kasmo‚Äôs purpose is to make the concepts behind AI accessible, open to debate, and grounded in Somali linguistic and cultural realities.
The project builds on the earlier Somali Digital Rights Lexicon (2021), where Somali linguists, researchers, and journalists worked together to translate key digital rights terms. As generative AI began reshaping how knowledge is created and circulated, this effort evolved into a new phase‚Äîdeveloping an interactive Somali‚ÄìEnglish lexicon of AI concepts. The AI lexicon you can see on this site features bi-lingual definitions for over 70 terms that are related to AI. They include technical concepts and social impacts. The lexicon is presented as a network, with links between related terms. Please click and explore. A simple PDF of the lexicon is also available here. Please download üëâüèø PDF and share!
Kasmo was co-developed with Akadeemiya Goboleedka Af Soomaaliga (AGA) ‚Äî the Intergovernmental Academy of Somali Language ‚Äî during a two-day workshop in Mogadishu that brought together linguists and researchers to coin and refine new Somali terminology for AI.
The overall project was coordinated by Dr.¬†Peter Chonka, Senior Lecturer in Global Digital Cultures at King‚Äôs College London and Mohamed Abdimalik, Jaantus. The activity has been supported by an AHRC Impact Acceleration Grant at King‚Äôs College London. The team is grateful for the input of Somali Public Agenda, Tayo Translations and Digital Shelter in reviewing the lexicon.
Kasmo is still in early development‚Äînew translations, terms, and visual features will continue to evolve through dialogue with educators, journalists, and civic groups. Further validation efforts are ongoing, a launch workshop is planned in Mogadishu in early November 2025. Generative AI was not intentionally used in the development of this lexicon.

title: About Kasmo
text:
Get involved

Educators, journalists, and civic groups interested in using or contributing to the lexicon are welcome.
Feedback on translations, terms, or UI/UX is appreciated.
